name: Myst Uru: The Path of the Shell
name_original: Myst Uru: The Path of the Shell
description:
Myst Uru: The Path of the Shell is an adventure game developed by Cyan Worlds. It was originally released in 2004. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game.
Myst Uru: The Path of the Shell is available on PC.
Tim Larkin scored the game.
